languages.text: Офицер складывает на груди аквилу — да будет исполнено! Дюжина сервочерепов разлетается по отсекам нижних палуб, неся ваш карательный приговор. И пока вы совершаете свое восхождение к капитанскому мостику, несколько сотен блюстителей загоняют в пустой отсек, оборудованный лишь механической "тысячеглавой" виселицей. Один поворот тумблера — и все блюстители нижних палуб разом понесли свое наказание.

traits.locale_text: Офицер складывает на груди аквилу — да будет исполнено! Дюжина сервочерепов разлетается по отсекам нижних палуб, неся ваш карательный приговор. И пока вы совершаете свое восхождение к капитанскому мостику, несколько сотен стражников загоняют в пустой отсек, оборудованный лишь механической "тысячеглавой" висилицей. Один поворот тумблера — и вся стража нижних палуб разом понесла свое наказание.

languages.text: The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry your stern verdict to the bays on the lower decks. And while you are completing your ascent to the captain's bridge, several hundred enforcers are herded into a compartment containing nothing but a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One flip of the switch and all the lower deck enforcers will simultaneously pay the price for their incompetence.
languages.original_text: Офицер складывает на груди аквилу — да будет исполнено! Дюжина сервочерепов разлетается по отсекам нижних палуб, неся ваш карательный приговор. И пока вы совершаете свое восхождение к капитанскому мостику, несколько сотен блюстителей загоняют в пустой отсек, оборудованный лишь механической "тысячеглавой" виселицей. Один поворот тумблера — и все блюстители нижних палуб разом понесли свое наказание.

traits.locale_text: The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry your stern verdict to different chambers on the lower decks. And as you ascend to your captain's bridge, several hundred guards are herded into an empty chamber which only contains a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One turn on of the toggle-switch and the entire lower-deck guard pays an instant penalty.

The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry your stern verdict to different chambers on the lower decks. And as you ascend to your captain's bridge, several hundred guards are herded into an empty chamber which only contains a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One turn on of the toggle-switch and the entire lower-deck guard pays an instant penalty.

The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry your stern verdict to different chambers on the lower decks. And as you ascend to your bridge, several hundred guards are herded into an empty chamber containing only a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One flip of the switch and all the lower deck guards will simultaneously pay the price for their incompetence.

The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry the Rogue Trader's stern verdict to the bays on the lower decks. And while {mf|he|she} is completing {mf|his|her} ascent to the captain's bridge, several hundred enforcers are herded into a compartment containing nothing but a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One flip of the switch and all the lower deck enforcers will simultaneously pay the price for their incompetence.

The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry the Rogue Trader's stern verdict to the bays on the lower decks. And while {mf|he|she} is completing {mf|his|her} ascent to the captain's bridge, several hundred enforcers are herded into a compartment containing nothing but a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One flip of the switch and all the lower deck enforcers will simultaneously pay the price for their incompetence.

The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry your stern verdict to the bays on the lower decks. And while you are completing your ascent to the captain's bridge, several hundred enforcers are herded into a compartment containing nothing but a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One flip of the switch and all the lower deck enforcers will simultaneously pay the price for their incompetence.

languages.text: 这位军官将双手叠在胸前，做了个双头鹰手势。这件事情就这么定了下来。十几颗伺服头骨飞走了，将你严厉的判决送到了底层甲板。当你登上舰桥的时候，几百名执法者已经被赶到了船舱里，里面只有一个可以同时绞死一千个人的机械绞架。只要按下开关，所有下层甲板的执法者都将为他们的无能而付出代价。
languages.original_text: The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry your stern verdict to the bays on the lower decks. And while you are completing your ascent to the captain's bridge, several hundred enforcers are herded into a compartment containing nothing but a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One flip of the switch and all the lower deck enforcers will simultaneously pay the price for their incompetence.

traits.locale_text: 这位军官将双手叠在胸前，做了个双头鹰手势。这件事情就这么定了下来。十几颗伺服头骨飞走了，将你严厉的判决送到了底层甲板。当你登上舰桥的时候，几百名执法者已经被赶到了船舱里，里面只有一个可以同时绞死一千个人的机械绞架。只要按下开关，所有下层甲板的执法者都将为他们的无能而付出代价。

languages.text: El oficial se lleva las manos al pecho para hacer el signo del Aquila. Así se hará. Una decena de servocráneos salen volando para transmitir tu severo veredicto a las bahías de las cubiertas inferiores. Mientras completas tu ascenso hasta el puente de mando, se lleva a cientos de guardias a un compartimento que contiene únicamente un patíbulo mecánico de «mil cabezas». Con pulsar el interruptor, todos los guardias de las cubiertas inferiores pagarán el precio de su incompetencia al mismo tiempo.
languages.original_text: The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry your stern verdict to the bays on the lower decks. And while you are completing your ascent to the captain's bridge, several hundred enforcers are herded into a compartment containing nothing but a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One flip of the switch and all the lower deck enforcers will simultaneously pay the price for their incompetence.

traits.locale_text: El oficial se lleva las manos al pecho para hacer el signo del Aquila. Así se hará. Una decena de servocráneos salen volando para transmitir el severo veredicto de{mf|l|la} Comerciante Independiente a las bahías de las cubiertas inferiores. Mientras completa su ascenso hasta el puente del capitán, se lleva a cientos de guardias a un compartimento que contiene únicamente un patíbulo mecánico de «mil cabezas». Con pulsar el interruptor, todos los guardias de las cubiertas inferiores pagarán el precio de su incompetencia al mismo tiempo.

languages.text: 士官はアクィラの印に胸の前で手を合わせた。これで終わりだ。サーヴォスカルが飛び立ち、あなたの厳しい評決を下甲板の船倉に運ぶ。 そして、あなたが艦橋へと上る間、数百人の執行官たちは機械式の絞首台「千の頭」だけが置かれた区画室に集められる。スイッチひとつで、下甲板の執行官が全員同時に、自分たちの無能の代償を払うことになるのだ。
languages.original_text: The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry your stern verdict to the bays on the lower decks. And while you are completing your ascent to the captain's bridge, several hundred enforcers are herded into a compartment containing nothing but a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One flip of the switch and all the lower deck enforcers will simultaneously pay the price for their incompetence.

traits.locale_text: 士官はアクィラの印に胸の前で手を合わせた。これで終わりだ。サーヴォスカルが飛び立ち、ローグトレーダーの厳しい評決を下甲板の船倉に運ぶ。 そして、艦橋へと上る間、数百人の執行官たちは機械式の絞首台「千の頭」だけが置かれた区画室に集められる。スイッチひとつで、下甲板の執行官が全員同時に、自分たちの無能の代償を払うことになるのだ。

languages.text: Der Offizier faltet die Hände vor der Brust zum Zeichen des Adlers. Es wird geschehen. Ein Dutzend Servoschädel fliegen davon, um dein strenges Urteil in die Module der Unterdecks zu tragen. Und während du dich zurück auf die Brücke des Raumschiffs begibst, werden Hunderte von Enforcern in ein leeres Modul getrieben, das nur mit einem mechanischen 'tausendköpfigen' Galgen ausgestattet ist. Ein einziger Tastendruck genügt, und alle Enforcer des Unterdecks bezahlen gleichzeitig den Preis für ihre Inkompetenz.
languages.original_text: The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry your stern verdict to the bays on the lower decks. And while you are completing your ascent to the captain's bridge, several hundred enforcers are herded into a compartment containing nothing but a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One flip of the switch and all the lower deck enforcers will simultaneously pay the price for their incompetence.

traits.locale_text: Der Offizier faltet die Hände vor der Brust zum Zeichen des Adlers. Es wird geschehen. Ein Dutzend Servoschädel fliegen davon, um dein strenges Urteil in die Module der Unterdecks zu tragen. Und während du dich zurück auf die Brücke des Raumschiffs begibst, werden Hunderte von Enforcern in ein leeres Modul getrieben, das nur mit einem mechanischen 'tausendköpfigen' Galgen ausgestattet ist. Ein einziger Tastendruck genügt, und alle Enforcer des Unterdecks bezahlen gleichzeitig den Preis für ihre Inkompetenz.

Der Offizier faltet die Hände vor der Brust zum Zeichen des Adlers. Es wird geschehen. Ein Dutzend Servoschädel fliegen davon, um das strenge Urteil {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} in die Module der Unterdecks zu tragen. Und während {mf|er|sie} sich zurück auf die Brücke des Raumschiffs begibt, werden mehrere hundert Enforcers in ein leeres Modul getrieben, das nur mit einem mechanischen "tausendköpfigen" Galgen ausgestattet ist. Ein einziger Tastendruck und alle Enforcers des Unterdecks bezahlen gleichzeitig den Preis für ihre Inkompetenz.

languages.text: L'officier place ses mains sur sa poitrine pour former le symbole de l'Aquila. Ce sera fait. Une dizaine de servocrânes s'envolent pour propager votre sévère verdict dans les baies des ponts inférieurs. Et tandis que terminez votre ascension vers la passerelle de commandement, plusieurs centaines de prévots sont escortés dans un compartiment contenant une potence mécanique « à mille têtes ». Il suffira d'appuyer sur le bouton pour que tous les prévots des ponts inférieurs paient simultanément le prix de leur incompétence.
languages.original_text: The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry your stern verdict to the bays on the lower decks. And while you are completing your ascent to the captain's bridge, several hundred enforcers are herded into a compartment containing nothing but a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One flip of the switch and all the lower deck enforcers will simultaneously pay the price for their incompetence.

traits.locale_text: L'officier place ses mains sur sa poitrine pour former le symbole de l'Aquila. Ce sera fait. Une dizaine de servocrânes s'envolent pour propager le sévère verdict {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} dans les baies des ponts inférieurs. Et tandis qu'{mf|il|elle} termine son ascension vers la passerelle de commandement, plusieurs centaines d'exécutants sont escortés dans un compartiment contenant une potence mécanique « à mille têtes ». Il suffira d'appuyer sur le bouton pour que tous les exécutants des ponts inférieurs paient simultanément le prix de leur incompétence.

languages.text: Subay, ellerini göğsünde birleştirerek Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyor. Emrin yerine getirilecek. Bir düzine hizmelet, sert kararını alt güvertelerdeki bölmelere iletmek için havalanıyor. Sen kaptan köprüsüne doğru çıkarken yüzlerce infazcı; içinde sadece mekanik bir "bin başlı" darağacı olan, boş bir bölmeye sürülüyor. Düğmeye basılmasıyla tüm alt güverte infazcıları, hak ettikleri cezayı alıyor.
languages.original_text: The officer folds his hands on his chest in the sign of the Aquila. It will be done. A dozen servo-skulls fly off to carry your stern verdict to the bays on the lower decks. And while you are completing your ascent to the captain's bridge, several hundred enforcers are herded into a compartment containing nothing but a "thousand-headed" mechanical gallows. One flip of the switch and all the lower deck enforcers will simultaneously pay the price for their incompetence.
